an4.60:1.1: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho anathapindikam gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
an4.60:2.1: “Catuhi kho, gahapati, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako gihisamicipatipadam patipanno hoti yasopatilabhinim saggasamvattanikam.
an4.60:2.3: Idha, gahapati, ariyasavako bhikkhusangham paccupatthito hoti civarena, bhikkhusangham paccupatthito hoti pindapatena, bhikkhusangham paccupatthito hoti senasanena, bhikkhusangham paccupatthito hoti gilanappaccayabhesajjaparikkharena.
an4.60:2.4: Imehi kho, gahapati, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako gihisamicipatipadam patipanno hoti yasopatilabhinim saggasamvattanikanti.
